name: Pent-up Calamity
effect:
Add 1 {disease} and 1 {strife}{spacer_tiny}.
{wide_or}
Remove any number of {beast}/{disease}/{strife}/{wilds}.
For each token Removed, 1 {fear} and 3 Damage.

threshold.effectText: If you have Removed tokens, return up to 2 of them. Otherwise, add 2 {strife}{spacer_tiny}.
